title: These Are the Best Sale Items at Revolve Right Now
description: And it isn’t even Black Friday yet...
excerpt: And it isn’t even Black Friday yet...
text: Those who know how to shop....shop at Revolve. There, I said it, and I stand by it. The retailer carries more than 1,000 brands—both emerging and well-established designers—and spans fashion, beauty, lifestyle, and home. (Chances are very high that your favorite brands are already sold there.) And the sales? Oh, they’re big. That’s why I’ve dedicated this space to keeping watch for Revolve’s Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals. Scroll on to see the best marked down items to shop right now, and check back next week for updates on the latest and greatest savings. Best Shoe Deals at RevolveThis is everyone’s favorite part, right? You can never have too many shoes, and I don’t care what Marie Kondo has to say about it. I currently have a pair of warm UGG booties and a Gia Borghini pump in my cart. The editor-loved Glove flat from Mansur Gavriel is also marked down right now. L'AGENCE Claude III BootNow 30% OffJeffrey Campbell Swanlake FlatNow 30% OffParis Texas Liza 85 SlingbackNow 40% OffNike Field General 82 SneakerNow 35% OffRAYE Imogen SandalNow 30% OffSeychelles American DreamsNow 29% OffBest Bag Deals at RevolveStocked with favorites like Bella Hadid’s Coach tote and the viral glittery Cult Gaia bag, this section is a treasure trove. In particular, I’m hoping to see Diesel bags go on sale next week. Flattered Tuna Shoulder Bag Now 30% OffCult Gaia Hera Nano Shoulder Bag Now 23% OffLoeffler Randall Ramona Bow Shoulder BagNow 30% OffB-Low the Belt Maxwell Hobo Now 51% OffSusan Fang Crochet Beaded Mini Bag Now 72% OffFlattered Bo Bucket Bag Now 30% OffBest Outerwear Deals at RevolveEvery year, come November, I’m reminded of the importance of stylish outerwear. Without it, the world may never know how fashionable you are. Your base layers hardly see the light of day. This season is all about leather bombers, barn jackets, and suede blazers. Amanda Uprichard Jackson JacketNow 30% OffGRLFRND Christi Isabel Marant Etoile Limiza TrenchNow 30% OffMarques’ Almeida Off Shoulder Collar Jacket Now 30% OffCitizens of Humanity Elodie Shearling CoatNow 64% OffWellBeing + BeingWell Poppy Reversible Puffer Now 75% OffBest Denim Deals at RevolveSplurging on denim feels financially smart to me, and that’s what they call “girl math.” But think about it: It lasts forever, and you wear it all the time. It makes sense to invest in good jeans! Amanda Uprichard Braswell Jacket Now 30% OffEB Denim FredericNow 44% OffAGOLDE 90s Mid Rise Loose Fit Now 20% OffFIORUCCI Baggy Jeans Now 51% OffAGOLDE Della Skirt Now 58% OffFree People Amber Denim DressNow 55% OffBest Knitwear Deals at RevolveWhen you think fall and winter, you probably think of sweaters and knits. So, now that we’re talking about it, how is your collection faring these days? Be honest. There are a few ratty pullovers that I, for one, need to let go of. In their place, I will treat myself to something from Revolve’s sale department—potentially from Donni, the brand that makes my favorite kick flare pants. Kule The Dede Cardigan Now 45% OffCallahan Lyra Top Now 30% OffZemeta Ribbed Soul Asymmetric Sweater Now 40% OffRonny Kobo Elias Knit DressNow 26% OffLovers and Friends Lilah TurtleneckNow 62% OffVarley Reid Half Zip Sweater Best Dress Deals at RevolveWe may be in the dreary November doldrums now, but summer is never far from my mind, so of course I’m keeping an eye out for sundresses and vacation-ready frocks. Plus, there are all those holiday parties and winter weddings to plan for, too...Camila Coelho Charlie Mini DressNookie Bliss GownNow 35% OffAlex Perry Strapless Crystal Glove DressNow 30% OffSolid & Striped The Corrina DressNow 30% OffNubyen Columbia Flower Market Skort DressNow 68% OffBY.DYLN Bambi Maxi DressNow 39% OffBest Accessory Deals at Revolve’Tis the season for hats, gloves, tights, and more. If you’re looking to stock up on trending accessories for the winter, I’d recommend a cozy striped scarf, a chic balaclava, and all varieties of sculptural jewelry. And to all my brides out there, I’m begging you to buy this punk-rock veil. B-Low the Belt Alice Now 40% OffIsabel Marant Firny ScarfNow 35% OffGigi & Olive Embroidered Midi Veil Now 38% OffOFF-WHITE Bookish Calf Socks Now 40% OffBurberry Cat Eye SunglassesNow 30% OffJennifer Behr Emma Bobby Pin Set Now 45% OffMeg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
html:
Those who know how to shop....shop at Revolve. There, I said it, and I stand by it. The retailer carries more than 1,000 brands—both emerging and well-established designers—and spans fashion, beauty, lifestyle, and home. (Chances are very high that your favorite brands are already sold there.) And the sales? Oh, they’re big. That’s why I’ve dedicated this space to keeping watch for Revolve’s Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals. Scroll on to see the best marked down items to shop right now, and check back next week for updates on the latest and greatest savings.

Best Shoe Deals at Revolve

This is everyone’s favorite part, right? You can never have too many shoes, and I don’t care what Marie Kondo has to say about it. I currently have a pair of warm UGG booties and a Gia Borghini pump in my cart. The editor-loved Glove flat from Mansur Gavriel is also marked down right now.

L'AGENCE Claude III Boot

Now 30% Off

Jeffrey Campbell Swanlake Flat

Now 30% Off

Paris Texas Liza 85 Slingback

Now 40% Off

Nike Field General 82 Sneaker

Now 35% Off

RAYE Imogen Sandal

Now 30% Off

Seychelles American Dreams

Now 29% Off

Best Bag Deals at Revolve

Stocked with favorites like Bella Hadid’s Coach tote and the viral glittery Cult Gaia bag, this section is a treasure trove. In particular, I’m hoping to see Diesel bags go on sale next week.

Flattered Tuna Shoulder Bag

Now 30% Off

Cult Gaia Hera Nano Shoulder Bag

Now 23% Off

Loeffler Randall Ramona Bow Shoulder Bag

Now 30% Off

B-Low the Belt Maxwell Hobo

Now 51% Off

Susan Fang Crochet Beaded Mini Bag

Now 72% Off

Flattered Bo Bucket Bag

Now 30% Off

Best Outerwear Deals at Revolve

Every year, come November, I’m reminded of the importance of stylish outerwear. Without it, the world may never know how fashionable you are. Your base layers hardly see the light of day. This season is all about leather bombers, barn jackets, and suede blazers.

Amanda Uprichard Jackson Jacket

Now 30% Off

GRLFRND Christi

Isabel Marant Etoile Limiza Trench

Now 30% Off

Marques’ Almeida Off Shoulder Collar Jacket

Now 30% Off

Citizens of Humanity Elodie Shearling Coat

Now 64% Off

WellBeing + BeingWell Poppy Reversible Puffer

Now 75% Off

Best Denim Deals at Revolve

Splurging on denim feels financially smart to me, and that’s what they call “girl math.” But think about it: It lasts forever, and you wear it all the time. It makes sense to invest in good jeans!

Amanda Uprichard Braswell Jacket

Now 30% Off

EB Denim Frederic

Now 44% Off

AGOLDE 90s Mid Rise Loose Fit

Now 20% Off

FIORUCCI Baggy Jeans

Now 51% Off

AGOLDE Della Skirt

Now 58% Off

Free People Amber Denim Dress

Now 55% Off

Best Knitwear Deals at Revolve

When you think fall and winter, you probably think of sweaters and knits. So, now that we’re talking about it, how is your collection faring these days? Be honest. There are a few ratty pullovers that I, for one, need to let go of. In their place, I will treat myself to something from Revolve’s sale department—potentially from Donni, the brand that makes my favorite kick flare pants.

Kule The Dede Cardigan

Now 45% Off

Callahan Lyra Top

Now 30% Off

Zemeta Ribbed Soul Asymmetric Sweater

Now 40% Off

Ronny Kobo Elias Knit Dress

Now 26% Off

Lovers and Friends Lilah Turtleneck

Now 62% Off

Varley Reid Half Zip Sweater

Best Dress Deals at Revolve

We may be in the dreary November doldrums now, but summer is never far from my mind, so of course I’m keeping an eye out for sundresses and vacation-ready frocks. Plus, there are all those holiday parties and winter weddings to plan for, too...

Camila Coelho Charlie Mini Dress

Nookie Bliss Gown

Now 35% Off

Alex Perry Strapless Crystal Glove Dress

Now 30% Off

Solid & Striped The Corrina Dress

Now 30% Off

Nubyen Columbia Flower Market Skort Dress

Now 68% Off

BY.DYLN Bambi Maxi Dress

Now 39% Off

Best Accessory Deals at Revolve

’Tis the season for hats, gloves, tights, and more. If you’re looking to stock up on trending accessories for the winter, I’d recommend a cozy striped scarf, a chic balaclava, and all varieties of sculptural jewelry. And to all my brides out there, I’m begging you to buy this punk-rock veil.

Meg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
